resources.string: Please enter the author name you want to use for newly inserted annotations.
Annotations will be embedded in the PDF and remain editable.
Annotations will be rendered in the PDF and will not be editable.
The PDF won’t contain any annotations.
There was a problem while trying to record audio.
Are you sure you want to clear all annotations?
The specified value isn’t a valid color.
Select three points on both documents for manual alignment. For best results, choose points near the corners of the documents, ensuring the points are in the same order on both documents.
Type value or pick from list
Certificate chain couldn’t be verified, as no trusted keys were supplied.
General failure while trying to determine document integrity.
Invalid signature — since signing the content of this document, the document has been modified, tampered with, or corrupted.
The revision covered by this signature hasn’t been modified. However, changes have been made to the document since it was signed.
The signature is valid and the content of this document hasn’t been modified since it was signed.
Couldn’t compute the digest for the document.
Couldn’t retrieve the byte range of the signature.
Couldn’t retrieve the public key from the signature.
Couldn’t retrieve the certificate from the signature.
General failure while trying to determine document integrity.
It was signed by %1$s on %2$s at %3$s.
It claims to have been signed by %1$s on %2$s at %3$s.
It claims to have been signed on %1$s at %2$s.
Signature is valid, but there are some warnings.
An unknown error has occurred while trying to open this file.
Invalid date/time: Please ensure that the date/time exists. Field [%1$s] should match format %2$s
The value entered doesn’t match the format of the field [%1$s]
Invalid value: must be greater than or equal to %1$s and less than or equal to %2$s.
Invalid value: must be greater than or equal to %1$s.
Invalid value: must be less than or equal to %1$s.
Entered text couldn’t be converted to an Integer or URL.
Enter page index or an http:// address to link to an URL.
There are no applications installed that can open PDF documents.

It seems you have permanently denied the file system access for this app. In order to view and open PDF files stored on your device, you need to manually enable the file system permission via the app settings screen.
Audio can’t be recorded at the moment. Please grant this app permission to access your microphone.
Are you sure you want to delete this annotation?
Applying redactions will permanently remove the information and can’t be undone.
Content marked for redaction won’t be removed when saving the document. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Text-to-speech service unavailable. Make sure you have an active internet connection or Google Text-to-Speech engine installed and enabled on your device.
An update for %1$s is required to access the document and sync annotations.
